children.text: The steel reinforcement specified by the engineer has not been installed as detailed on the engineering drawings where there are pipes penetrating the slab fabric top mesh.

This will need to be re-constructed on site to reflect the designed requirements of the approved drawings prior to pouring concrete, or otherwise be re-designed and certified by the original design engineer. The building permit may also need to be amended by the relevant building surveyor to reflect the changes to the approved drawings.
